article_title: Congressional Spending Bill Gets Entangled in Syria Refugee Measure
article_text:
WASHINGTON—An effort to halt and overhaul a Syrian refugee program is becoming one of the biggest sticking points of negotiations over a spending bill needed to avoid a government shutdown next Friday.

Many Republicans said Wednesday that the refugee measure had become a top priority as lawmakers haggled over which policy provisions will be included in the measure to keep the government running after its current funding expires Dec....
